titleStmt.title: Letters written by Sir W. Temple, Bart., and other ministers of state, both at home and abroad containing an account of the most important transactions that pass'd in Christendom from 1665-1672 : in two volumes / review'd by Sir W. Temple sometime before his death ; and published by Jonathan Swift ...
titleStmt.author: Temple, William, Sir, 1628-1699.
Swift, Jonathan, 1667-1745.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Tonson ... and A. and J. Churchil ... and R. Simpson ...,

notesStmt.note: Vol. 3 was published in 1703 under title: Letters to the King, the Prince of Orange, the chief ministers of state ... being the third and last volume ... London : Tim. Goodwin and Benj. Tooke, 1703.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
